titleStmt.title: The exercise of prayer: or, A help to devotion Being a supplement to the happy ascetick, or best exercise. Containing prayers and devotions, suitable to the respective exercises with additional prayers for several occasions. By Anth. Horneck D.D.
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

titleStmt.title: The exercise of prayer: or, A help to devotion Being a supplement to the happy ascetick, or best exercise. Containing prayers and devotions, suitable to the respective exercises with additional prayers for several occasions. By Anth. Horneck D.D.
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Mark Pardoe at the Black Raven, over against Bedford-house in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: As the title says, intended as a supplement to his Happy ascetick.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
